00036 #include "PdeAndBoundaryConditions.hpp"
00037 
00038 template<unsigned DIM>
00039 PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::PdeAndBoundaryConditions(AbstractLinearEllipticPde<DIM,DIM>* pPde,
00040                                                         AbstractBoundaryCondition<DIM>* pBoundaryCondition,
00041                                                         bool isNeumannBoundaryCondition,
00042                                                         Vec solution,
00043                                                         bool deleteMemberPointersInDestructor)
00044     : mpPde(pPde),
00045       mpBoundaryCondition(pBoundaryCondition),
00046       mIsNeumannBoundaryCondition(isNeumannBoundaryCondition),
00047       mSolution(NULL),
00048       mDeleteMemberPointersInDestructor(deleteMemberPointersInDestructor),
00049       mDependentVariableName("")
00050 {
00051     if (solution)
00052     {
00053         mSolution = solution;
00054     }
00055 }
00056 
00057 template<unsigned DIM>
00058 PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::~PdeAndBoundaryConditions()
00059 {
00060     // Avoid memory leaks if the object was loaded from an archive
00061     if (mDeleteMemberPointersInDestructor)
00062     {
00063         delete mpPde;
00064         delete mpBoundaryCondition;
00065     }
00066 
00067     DestroySolution();
00068 }
00069 
00070 template<unsigned DIM>
00071 AbstractLinearEllipticPde<DIM,DIM>* PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::GetPde()
00072 {
00073     return mpPde;
00074 }
00075 
00076 template<unsigned DIM>
00077 AbstractBoundaryCondition<DIM>* PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::GetBoundaryCondition() const
00078 {
00079     return mpBoundaryCondition;
00080 }

00082 template<unsigned DIM>
00083 Vec PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::GetSolution()
00084 {
00085     return mSolution;
00086 }
00087 
00088 template<unsigned DIM>
00089 Vec PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::GetSolution() const
00090 {
00091     return mSolution;
00092 }
00093 
00094 template<unsigned DIM>
00095 void PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::SetSolution(Vec solution)
00096 {
00097     mSolution = solution;
00098 }
00099 
00100 template<unsigned DIM>
00101 bool PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::IsNeumannBoundaryCondition()
00102 {
00103     return mIsNeumannBoundaryCondition;
00104 }
00105 
00106 template<unsigned DIM>
00107 bool PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::HasAveragedSourcePde()
00108 {
00109     return (dynamic_cast<AveragedSourcePde<DIM>*>(mpPde) != NULL);
00110 }
00111 
00112 template<unsigned DIM>
00113 void PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::DestroySolution()
00114 {
00115     if (mSolution)
00116     {
00117         PetscTools::Destroy(mSolution);
00118     }
00119 }
00120 
00121 template<unsigned DIM>
00122 void PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::SetUpSourceTermsForAveragedSourcePde(TetrahedralMesh<DIM,DIM>* pMesh, std::map< CellPtr, unsigned >* pCellPdeElementMap)
00123 {
00124     assert(HasAveragedSourcePde());
00125     static_cast<AveragedSourcePde<DIM>*>(mpPde)->SetupSourceTerms(*pMesh, pCellPdeElementMap);
00126 }

00129 void PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::SetDependentVariableName(const std::string& rName)
00130 {
00131     mDependentVariableName = rName;
00132 }

00134 template<unsigned DIM>
00135 std::string& PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::rGetDependentVariableName()
00136 {
00137     return mDependentVariableName;
